title: LA HOYA by DULY | New Build Apartments & Penthouse in Torrevieja from €293,000
description: Full video tour of LA HOYA, a stunning new build development by DULY in La Siesta, Torrevieja. Modern apartments and penthouses with pools, terraces, and Mediterranean views. 2-bed units from €293,000 to €334,000. Delivery Q1 2027.
